name: Stock Settings
description: Default settings for your stock-related transactions

fields.name: ri2puiprr5
fields.label: Auto Insert Item Price If Missing

fields.name: ri20ibb18t
fields.label: Allow to Edit Stock UOM Qty for Sales Documents

fields.name: ri28uraeba
fields.label: Allow to Edit Stock UOM Qty for Purchase Documents

fields.name: ri23gr6q0j
fields.label: Allow UOM with Conversion Rate Defined in Item
fields.description: If enabled, the system will allow selecting UOMs in sales and purchase transactions only if the conversion rate is set in the item master.

fields.name: ri227qr9l5
fields.label: Over Delivery/Receipt Allowance (%)
fields.description: The percentage you are allowed to receive or deliver more against the quantity ordered. For example, if you have ordered 100 units, and your Allowance is 10%, then you are allowed to receive 110 units.

fields.name: ri2d5udkqs
fields.label: Over Transfer Allowance
fields.description: The percentage you are allowed to transfer more against the quantity ordered. For example, if you have ordered 100 units, and your Allowance is 10%, then you are allowed transfer 110 units.

fields.name: ri2oseabi1
fields.label: Over Picking Allowance
fields.description: The percentage you are allowed to pick more items in the pick list than the ordered quantity.

fields.name: ri23o3486q
fields.label: Role Allowed to Over Deliver/Receive
fields.description: Users with this role are allowed to over deliver/receive against orders above the allowance percentage

fields.name: ri2idsb8qf
fields.label: Show Barcode Field in Stock Transactions

fields.name: ri2bpif5j9
fields.label: Convert Item Description to Clean HTML in Transactions

fields.name: ri25j20kms
fields.label: Allow Internal Transfers at Arm's Length Price
fields.description: If enabled, the item rate won't adjust to the valuation rate during internal transfers, but accounting will still use the valuation rate.

fields.name: ri2hbaaepe
fields.label: Allow existing Serial No to be Manufactured/Received again

fields.name: ri2i9c98hu
fields.label: Do Not Use Batch-wise Valuation
fields.description: If enabled, the system will use the moving average valuation method to calculate the valuation rate for the batched items and will not consider the individual batch-wise incoming rate.

fields.name: ri2csk72r7
fields.label: Auto Create Serial and Batch Bundle For Outward

fields.name: ri2nkcr15q
fields.label: Disable Serial No And Batch Selector

fields.name: ri2lqgpoq2
fields.label: Use Serial / Batch Fields
fields.description: On submission of the stock transaction, system will auto create the Serial and Batch Bundle based on the Serial No / Batch fields.

fields.name: ri2l7a25ro
fields.label: Do Not Update Serial / Batch on Creation of Auto Bundle
fields.description:
If enabled, do not update serial / batch values in the stock transactions on creation of auto Serial 
 / Batch Bundle.

fields.name: ri2vkis349
fields.label: Set Serial and Batch Bundle Naming Based on Naming Series

fields.name: ri2v2bdsue
fields.label: Have Default Naming Series for Batch ID?

fields.name: ri2mqiatc6
fields.label: Enable Stock Reservation
fields.description: Allows to keep aside a specific quantity of inventory for a particular order.

fields.name: ri2m4qa4et
fields.label: Auto Reserve Stock
fields.description: Upon submission of the Sales Order, Work Order, or Production Plan, the system will automatically reserve the stock.

fields.name: ri2sadk324
fields.label: Allow Partial Reservation
fields.description: Partial stock can be reserved. For example, If you have a Sales Order of 100 units and the Available Stock is 90 units then a Stock Reservation Entry will be created for 90 units.

fields.name: ri286kcb77
fields.label: Auto Reserve Stock for Sales Order on Purchase
fields.description: Stock will be reserved on submission of Purchase Receipt created against Material Request for Sales Order.

fields.name: ri2kr7jrrp
fields.label: Auto Reserve Serial and Batch Nos
fields.description: Serial and Batch Nos will be auto-reserved based on Pick Serial / Batch Based On

fields.name: ri227lecoo
fields.label: Action If Quality Inspection Is Not Submitted

fields.name: ri2m4pte6t
fields.label: Action If Quality Inspection Is Rejected

fields.name: ri2sd6sgs5
fields.label: Allow to Make Quality Inspection after Purchase / Delivery

fields.name: ri2lqpdtkb
fields.label: Raise Material Request When Stock Reaches Re-order Level

fields.name: ri2tlald2o
fields.label: Notify by Email on Creation of Automatic Material Request

fields.name: ri2ptr69ro
fields.label: Allow Material Transfer from Delivery Note to Sales Invoice

fields.name: ri2vngsvq1
fields.label: Allow Material Transfer from Purchase Receipt to Purchase Invoice

fields.name: ri2bi2f89e
fields.label: Stock Frozen Up To
fields.description: No stock transactions can be created or modified before this date.

fields.name: ri24vu3i0v
fields.label: Freeze Stocks Older Than (Days)
fields.description: Stock transactions that are older than the mentioned days cannot be modified.

fields.name: ri23600lms
fields.label: Role Allowed to Create/Edit Back-dated Transactions
fields.description: If mentioned, the system will allow only the users with this Role to create or modify any stock transaction earlier than the latest stock transaction for a specific item and warehouse. If set as blank, it allows all users to create/edit back-dated transactions.

fields.name: ri24btsocb
fields.label: Role Allowed to Edit Frozen Stock
fields.description: The users with this Role are allowed to create/modify a stock transaction, even though the transaction is frozen.
